entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon then light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
